statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp, preference_category FROM user_interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE preference_category = 'Technology' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE preference_category = 'Food' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE preference_category = 'sports';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_category FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_details LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY preference_category ASC, interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) as interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id, interaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions
SELECT user_id, interaction_time FROM UserInteractions
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC
SELECT user_id, interaction_data FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'click'
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_data FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'view' AND interaction_time >= '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, interaction_data FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND interaction_time >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT u.user_id, p.preference_type, p.preference_value FROM UserInteractions u JOIN UserPreferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_data ->> 'action' = 'submit' AND interaction_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM User_Interactions;
SELECT user_id, message_delivery_pref, message_frequency_pref FROM User_Preferences;
SELECT message_id, user_id, message_content FROM Message_Log;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp, interaction_data FROM User_Interactions;
SELECT user_id, message_content, message_timestamp FROM Message_Log;
SELECT * FROM User_Interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM User_Interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_timezone FROM User_Preferences WHERE message_delivery_pref = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Message_Log WHERE user_id = 2 AND message_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(message_id) AS total_messages FROM Message_Log GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_messages > 5;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT template_content FROM MessageTemplates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, template_id, delivery_timestamp FROM DeliveryLogs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY delivery_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 123 OR preference_type = 'theme';
SELECT template_id, template_content FROM MessageTemplates ORDER BY template_id ASC;

SELECT U.user_id, M.template_content, D.delivery_timestamp FROM UserInteractions U JOIN DeliveryLogs D ON U.user_id = D.user_id JOIN MessageTemplates M ON D.template_id = M.template_id WHERE U.interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY D.delivery_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users, MONTH(delivery_timestamp) AS month FROM DeliveryLogs GROUP BY MONTH(delivery_timestamp);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT message_content, created_at FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 2 AND interaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT user_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE preference_key LIKE '%theme%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_key LIKE 'theme%';

SELECT u.username, m.message_content, n.notification_type FROM users u JOIN messages m ON u.user_id = m.sender_id JOIN notifications n ON u.user_id = n.user_id WHERE n.notification_type = 'inbox' ORDER BY n.sent_at ASC;
